name: McDonald's
description: Classic, long-running fast-food chain known for its burgers & fries.
status: Closes soon  10 p.m.  Opens 6 a.m. Sun

featured_reviews.review_id: This location's food always makes me sick. Drive-thru staff didn't even know how to submit a smoothie as the drink for the happy meal we ordered. Pies are seemingly nevere ready/available at this location. Not a fan, won't be back here again
featured_reviews.review_text: This location's food always makes me sick. Drive-thru staff didn't even know how to submit a smoothie as the drink for the happy meal we ordered. Pies are seemingly nevere ready/available at this location. Not a fan, won't be back here again

featured_reviews.review_id:
Ordered 10 nuggets meal and it tasted unbelievable.  The nuggets was hot and tasty.  Fries were perfectly seasoned.
The manager who took my order was amazing.  He is so kind and fast.  Will be return here again.
featured_reviews.review_text:
Ordered 10 nuggets meal and it tasted unbelievable.  The nuggets was hot and tasty.  Fries were perfectly seasoned.
The manager who took my order was amazing.  He is so kind and fast.  Will be return here again.

featured_reviews.review_id: A typical McDonalds location. We just went in, ordered on the machine, got our McFlurries, and left. The service and ice creams were good and the place looked clean inside. Outside I noticed several kids hanging out and litering. I didn't stay long enough to see if the restaurant did anything about it, but from other reviews, this seems to be an ongoing problem.
featured_reviews.review_text: A typical McDonalds location. We just went in, ordered on the machine, got our McFlurries, and left. featured_reviews.review_id:
I recently had the pleasure of dining at McDonald's and indulging in their famous Big Mac meal. Let me just say, I was thoroughly convinced that this fast-food chain knows how to deliver a satisfying and delicious experience.

The Big Mac meal truly lives up to its reputation. The moment I unwrapped the iconic burger, I was greeted by a mouthwatering aroma that instantly made my taste buds dance with anticipation. The perfectly toasted sesame seed bun held together two juicy beef patties, topped with the signature Big Mac sauce, crisp lettuce, tangy pickles, and melted cheese. Every bite was a symphony of flavors that left me wanting more.

What impressed me the most was the consistency in the quality of the Big Mac meal. No matter which McDonald's location I visit, I can always count on the same great taste and satisfaction. This level of reliability is a testament to their commitment to delivering a consistently delicious product.

In addition to the incredible taste, the value for money at McDonald's is unbeatable. The Big Mac meal offers a generous portion size that leaves you feeling fully satisfied without breaking the bank. It's the perfect option for a quick and affordable meal that doesn't compromise on taste or quality.

The service at McDonald's is also worth mentioning. The staff members are always friendly, efficient, and ready to assist with any requests. Whether it's customizing your order or providing recommendations, they go above and beyond to ensure a pleasant dining experience.

Overall, McDonald's has truly mastered the art of the Big Mac meal. The combination of mouthwatering flavors, consistent quality, and excellent service make it a go-to choice for a quick and satisfying meal. If you're looking for a fast-food option that never disappoints, I highly recommend giving McDonald's a try. You won't be disappointed!

featured_reviews.review_id: Whoever gave my husband a breakfast burrito with WHITE TORTILLAS just made his ENTIRE year. You should have seen him rolling around on the bed in excitement like he was just given a free Michelin 5 star meal. Legit, this man has not stopped talking about how much he wants a regular breakfast burrito since you changed it.  Kudos to bringing back the OG breakfast burrito. Definitely will come here more now - simply because of that.

featured_reviews.review_id: This is not a large fry. Asked My partner to stop at mcdonalds, he does not eat carbs so im pretty sure he didn't eat the rest of the fries.  was ordered through DT and did not check. And only noticed when he got home.

featured_reviews.review_id: Some of the employees are very rude and they have no manners and one of the managers were making racist comments to customers this is completely unacceptable and I would like to see this being taken care of.  The way they treat the high school kids that come here is also very poorly.

featured_reviews.review_id: Restaurant busy with a lot of teen visiting the restaurant but the service is one of a kind.  It the right next to a gas station and across from the high school.  visit the place four time already, everytime i was lucky to be serve by Ail.  Ail is so focus and fast and friendly.  The best mcdonalds by far in the radius.
